question: لِيُبَيِّنَ
answer: so that he might make clear

question: تُحْصُوهَا
answer: you will (be able to) count them

question: لِتُخْرِجَ
answer: so that you may bring out

question: لَنُخْرِجَنَّكُمْ
answer: Surely we will drive you out

question: وَيُسْقَىٰ
answer: and he will be made to drink

question: وَلَنُسْكِنَنَّكُمُ
answer: And surely We will make you dwell

question: وَلَنَصْبِرَنَّ
answer: And surely we will bear with patience

question: لَهَدَيْنَاكُمْ
answer: surely we would have guided you
